import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { cart, fav, logoText, userImg } from "../assets"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { UserMenu } from "./UserMenu"; import CartContext from "../context/cartContext"; import { auth, getUser } from "../firebase/Firebase"; import { useAuthState } from "react-firebase-hooks/auth"; export const Header = () => { const cartItems = useContext(CartContext); const [user, loading, error] = useAuthState(auth); const [cartQty, setCartQty] = useState(cartItems.cartArray); useEffect(() => { setCartQty(cartItems.cartArray.length); }, [cartItems.cartArray]); const toggleMenu = () => { document.getElementById("menu").classList.toggle("hidden"); }; const username = async () => { let name = await getUser(user); return name; }; alert(username()); return (
{/* MOBILE MENU */}
Home Pages Shop Element Blog
{/* LAPTOP MENU */}
  • Home
  • Pages
  • Shop
  • Element
  • Blog
{cartQty}
View Cart
View Favorites
{user ? (
{/* */} {async () => await getUser(user)}
) : (

)}

); };
